stanzaliving - CLUSTER MANAGER

Location - DELHI/NCR & PUNE, Work Type: Full Time

Sales July 01, 2022

Job Responsibilities:

a. Demand Sales Planning & Budgeting

  • Prepare sales plan for peak traffic and non-peak traffic
  • Develop and implement sales strategy for all markets customized to the requirements of the territory
  • Track revenue achievement, occupancy, and conversion
  • Monitor competition
  • Recommend pricing strategies for all properties

b. Aid team members in achieving their targets

  • Help and aid in sales closures
  • Go out on coaching calls with team members
  • Contribute to ideas and concepts for furthering the team's objectives

c. Team Management

  • Participate actively in all team activities including going to properties
  • Coach and mentor team members
  • Actively encourage upward feedback
  • Provide training to all team members on a regular basis on sales skills
  • Spend time with team members in giving feedback on their performance and also in resolving issues/ conflicts

d. Implement & maintain processes and systems by ground staff as developed centrally

Requirements:

  • 6+ years of prior B2C & B2B Sales & Marketing experience, preferably in a startup
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Versed with Local Language
  • User centered approach to problem solving
  • Ability to lead in a dynamic and fast paced environment
  • Awareness of geographical areas
  • Go getter, aggressive attitude Team handling spirit
Apply
